trans-unit.source: Represents a member of a type using a literal code fragment.
trans-unit.target: 表示一個使用常值程式碼片段的型別成員。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember> can represent a member of a type using a literal code fragment that is included directly in the source without modification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember> 可以表示使用直接包含在未經修改的來源常值的程式碼片段的型別的成員。

trans-unit.source: This code can be included in the type declaration.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼可併入的型別宣告。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember> stores a section of code, exactly in its original format, as a string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember>一段程式碼，完全以其原始格式儲存，做為字串。

trans-unit.source: The CodeDOM does not translate literal code fragments.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 不會轉譯常值的程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: Literal code fragments are stored and output in their original format.
trans-unit.target: 常值的程式碼片段會儲存，並以原始格式輸出。

trans-unit.source: CodeDOM objects that contain literal code are provided so developers can encapsulate code that is already in the target language.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 物件，其中包含常值的程式碼被為了讓開發人員可以將封裝已在目標語言的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.Text%2A> property contains the literal code for the type member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.Text%2A>屬性型別成員包含常值的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember> class to store literal code in a string format.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember>儲存字串格式的常值的程式碼的類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromMember%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromMember%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The literal code fragment for the type member.
trans-unit.target: 型別成員的常值程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember" /> class using the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.%23ctor%2A>建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember>類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromMember%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromMember%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the literal code fragment for the type member.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定型別成員的常值程式碼片段。

trans-unit.source: The literal code fragment for the type member.
trans-unit.target: 型別成員的常值程式碼片段。
